headline: Show HN: I made a privacy-first minimalist Backblaze
description:
Creator here. I was looking for something as simple as Backblaze Personal [1] but privacy focused and open source. This is my attempt to build that.

Uses PyQt6 [2] for the GUI and Pyinstaller [3] for creating the platform specific binaries. The backup engine under the hood is Restic [4]. The server code is written in Laravel [5]. All the code is on GitHub [6].

I actually really like Backblaze (even use B2 for this offering behind the scenes) so this isn't meant to throw shade their way. Just wanted a private open source alternative. Something like Bitwarden but for backups.

[1] https://backblaze.com

[2] https://pypi.org/project/PyQt6

[3] https://pyinstaller.readthedocs.io/en/stable

[4] https://github.com/restic

[5] https://laravel.com

[6] https://github.com/blobbackup/blobbackup
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 我做了一个隐私至上的极简主义Backblaze
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 我做了一個隱私至上的極簡主義Backblaze
description_zh-Hans:
这里是创造者。我正在寻找像Backblaze Personal [1]那样简单的东西，但要注重隐私，而且是开源的。

GUI使用PyQt6[2]，Pyinstaller[3]用于创建特定平台的二进制文件。引擎盖下的备份引擎是Restic[4]。服务器代码是用Laravel[5]编写的。所有的代码都在GitHub上[6]。

实际上，我真的很喜欢Backblaze（甚至在幕后使用B2提供服务），所以这并不意味着要给他们泼冷水。我只是想找一个私人的开源替代品。Something like Bitwarden but for backups.

[1] https://backblaze.com

[2] https://pypi.org/project/PyQt6

[3] https://pyinstaller. readthedocs.io/en/stable

[4] https://github.com/restic

[5] https://laravel.com

[6] https://github.com/blobbackup/blobbackup
description_zh-Hant:
這裡是創造者。我正在尋找像Backblaze Personal [1]那樣簡單的東西，但要注重隱私，而且是開源的。

GUI使用PyQt6[2]，Pyinstaller[3]用於創建特定平臺的二進制文件。引擎蓋下的備份引擎是Restic[4]。服務器代碼是用Laravel[5]編寫的。所有的代碼都在GitHub上[6]。

實際上，我真的很喜歡Backblaze（甚至在幕後使用B2提供服務），所以這並不意味著要給他們潑冷水。我只是想找一個私人的開源替代品。Something like Bitwarden but for backups.

[1] https://backblaze.com

[2] https://pypi.org/project/PyQt6

[3] https://pyinstaller. readthedocs.io/en/stable

[4] https://github.com/restic

[5] https://laravel.com

[6] https://github.com/blobbackup/blobbackup
